about.history: Modeled in mid 2024 this was a key project for exploring various rendering techniques.
about.element_info: Hollow Ring is a mesmerizing, twisted band of shimmering metal, radiating an otherworldly aura. Through the power of geometry nodes in Blender, intricate patterns and special effects emerge across its hollow form, creating a dynamic spectacle of light and shadow. This ring embodies a fusion of mystic elegance and cutting-edge design—an exotic statement piece that showcases how even the simplest shapes can transform into powerful works of art with the right blend of creativity and technology.
